characters.name: Danny
characters.description: ex-miner with silicosis, he is the veteran conductor of Grimley Brass Band. He is single minded and seemingly oblivious to the fate of the mine.

characters.name: Phil
characters.description: Danny's son, a miner, trombone player and part time clown who is struggling for money. He is confused, sad and emasculated.

characters.name: Shane
characters.description: the son of Phil and Sandra through whom the story is told. Cheeky, energetic.

characters.name: Jim
characters.description: Plays the euphonium. An older miner and a hard leader.

characters.name: Harry
characters.description: Plays the EFlat Bass (Tuba). He's a miner and Jim's inseparable friend in pit and band

characters.name: Andy
characters.description: A miner and tenor horn player. The love interest.

characters.name: Sandra
characters.description: Phil's wife and mother of 3. She is desperate and resentful.

characters.name: Vera
characters.description: Jim's wife, kind but slightly materialistic.

characters.name: Rita
characters.description: Harry's wife. Strong, determined and an activist but has become distant from her husband.

characters.name: Gloria
characters.description: Fugelhorn Player. Newly returned to Grimley, she is sparky, self assured and principled.
